content: filthy animal is worked in the normal overlay mosaic row-by-row technique this wall hanging is free to download as a wee christmas present to all my lovely customers i ve always loved adding a little holiday humour to my décor and this quote from one of my all-time favourite christmas films never fails to make me smile so of course i had to turn it into a festive crochet wall-hanging or cushion cover if you re downloading this pattern i m guessing you know exactly which movie this line comes from --------------------------------------------- the pattern pdf has two easy-to-read charts and corresponding written instructions for both left and right-handers two pdfs are available - one using us terms and one using uk terms --------------------------------------------- if using dk weight yarn you will need approximately * colour a 225 metres / 246 yards * colour b 205 metres / 225 yards * double border 145 metres / 158 yards for this example i used yarnsmiths create dk in claret red and pale silver https //www woolwarehouse co uk/yarn/yarnsmiths-create-dk-all-colours 1 **main body ** * colour a yarnsmiths create dk in claret red 1 skein * colour b yarnsmiths create dk in pale silver 1 skein **2-row double border ** * colour a yarnsmiths create dk in claret red 1 skein **tools ** * 4mm hook for the main body * 3mm hook for the double border * scissors * stitch markers **size ** the size without the border will be approx 50cm x 50cm **gauge ** 18 stitches and 18 row for a 10x10cm gauge square using a 4mm hook --------------------------------------------- this design was created using my free small mosaic alphabet if you d like to customise your own holiday sayings or create entirely new projects you can download the alphabet for free on ravelry https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/smaller-mosaic-alphabet 2 --------------------------------------------- please share your creations online and tag @getyerhookon and #yafilthyanimalcrochet happy crocheting and merry christmas ya filthy animal abi 1 https //www woolwarehouse co uk/yarn/yarnsmiths-create-dk-all-colours 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/smaller-mosaic-alphabet
